channel.title: Photography on Kevin Cui
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Kevin Cui

item.title: Observe as A Photographer, as A Tester
item.description: -- “Photography is an art of observation. It’s about finding something interesting in an ordinary place… I’ve found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.” – Elliott Erwitt Since the beginning of this year, I took photography as a “serious” hobby. The interesting thing I found is that the more I have learned about photography, the more I can feel the similarities between photography and software testing.
